sourcesContent:
import 'react-app-polyfill/ie11'; import 'react-app-polyfill/stable'; import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // core components_chart 입력하는 부분_ // 아래에 차트 이름과, 차트 경로를 입력하면 된다. import chartData from "../../variables/charts.js"; import ReactFC from 'react-fusioncharts'; import ReactFusioncharts from "react-fusioncharts"; import FusionCharts from 'fusioncharts'; import charts from 'fusioncharts/fusioncharts.charts'; import Zoomline from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.zoomline"; import FusionTheme from 'fusioncharts/themes/fusioncharts.theme.fusion'; ReactFC.fcRoot(FusionCharts, charts, Zoomline, FusionTheme); charts(FusionCharts); let dataSource = []; let url = [ "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/number-of-transaction/accumulated/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/number-of-transaction/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/number-of-transaction/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/prediction-number-of-transaction/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vin/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vin/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vout/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vout/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/ratio-of-inout/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/cost-of-tx-volume/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/cost-per-tx/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/rate-of-change-transaction/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/rate-of-change-size/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/rate-of-change-output/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/nUtxo/accumulated/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/utxo-count/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/fee/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/output/total/month" ]; var tag = [ "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value" ]; var title = [ "Cumulative number of transaction", "Total number of transaction", "Average number of transaction", "Prediction number of transaction per block", "Total number of inputs", "Average number of inputs", "Total number of outputs", "Average number of outputs", "Average ratio of input to output", "Average ratio of mining revenue to transaction volume", "Average ratio of mining revenue to number of transaction", "Rate of change to number of transaction", "Rate of change to block size", "Rate of change to output", "Cumulative number of UTXOs", "Total number of UTXOs", "Total fee", "Total transaction output" ]; var caption = [ "The cumulative value of number of transactions per day.", "The total number of transactions per day.", "The average number of transactions per day.", "The prediction to number of transactions of next block.", "The total number of transaction inputs per day.", "The average number of transaction inputs per day.", "The total number of transaction outputs per day.", "The average number of transaction outputs per day.", "The average ratio of number of transaction inputs to number of transaction outputs per day.", "The daily average ratio of mining revenue (excluding fee) to total transaction volumes.", "The daily average ratio of mining revenue (excluding fee) to number of transaction.", "The average rate of change to number of transactions per day.", "The average rate of change to block size per day.", "The average rate of change to transaction output per day.", "The cumulative value of number of UTXOs (Unspent Transaction Outputs) per day.", "The total number of UTXOs (Unspent Transaction Outputs) per day.", "The total transaction fee per day.", "The total transaction outputs value per day.", ]; class bitcoinTx extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", //mean은 그래프 당 의미가 하나 밖에 없을 때는 사용하지 말것. mean:"Sum of Tx" }; } // 버튼 사용시 사용하는 생성자 setBgChartData = (name1, name2) => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name1, mean: name2 }); }; render() { for(var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) { dataSource[i] = chartData.renderGraph(url[i], tag[i], title[i], caption[i], i); console.log("임시 데이터 1 - " + i + " : "); console.log(JSON.stringify(dataSource[i])); } return ( <>

Bitcoin Transaction
); } } export default bitcoinTx;
